Function reference

version 3.2.2

Apply MP

Function to run a set of input control methods

  • Input

Runs input control MPs on a DLM_data object.

  • runInMP

Conduct stock assessment

  • Sam

Calculate TAC recommendations for more than one MP

  • TAC
